summary: August 31 is the 243rd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Chris Nicholas Duhon  is an American former professional basketball player and current assistant coach for the Marshall Thundering Herd men's basketball team. Duhon was a point guard for the Duke Blue Devils men's basketball team from 2000 to 2004. He then played for the Chicago Bulls, New York Knicks, Orlando Magic and Los Angeles Lakers. Fellow basketball player Jarrett Jack is his cousin.
title: Chris Duhon
